para.text: Sometimes, when you have a hierarchy of nested views, clicking over the view that you want will not immediately select it.. The

's selection mechanism will first select any parent object if appropriate before allowing you to "drill down" to the child views using subsequent clicks. If a hierarchy is deeply nested you may need click several times to select the view that you want.

para.text: With very complex hierarchies making a selection in this way can prove inconvenient or sometimes impossible. In these situations it is usually better to select the view that you want by locating it in the
